text: Didier Reynders (; born 6 August 1958) is a Belgian politician. He was the European Commissioner for Justice from 2019 to 2024. He was Federal Minister of Finance until December 2011 in six different cabinets, then Federal Minister for Foreign Affairs, Trade Foreign Affairs and European Affairs in two cabinets. He was the Minister of Defense until November 2019.http://www.ejustice.just.fgov.be/mopdf/2008/03/21_2.pdf ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian politicians
title: Didier Reynders
